1370: Maelkin was born in Paternoster straetje in 1370.
Got married to Liedelde at age 23 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Liedelde, Maelkin, at age 25.
1374: Lost son Radwardo when Radwardo was 0 years old.
Liedelde gave birth to their stillborn son Radwardo in 1374.
1376: Had a son with Liedelde, Alem, at age 29.
Lost son Alem when Alem was 1 years old.
1377: Had a son with Liedelde, Jan, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Auesoete, at age 31.
1380: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Woltwigis, at age 33.
1382: Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
